医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示药物与痴呆症风险的潜在联系大规模审查的结果表明某些药物可能会影响痴呆症风险，为预防和药物再利用策略提供了见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/Study-reveals-pottial-drug-links-to-Dementia-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/Study-reveals-pottial-drug-links-to-Dementia-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a87144d-8331-4b44-829c-ee7530a35386 Thu, 23 Jan 2025 07:10:00 -0500 Study reveals potential drug links to Dementia risk
新方法能够利用生物发光蛋白同时进行多色成像用荧光蛋白对活细胞进行成像长期以来一直是了解细胞行为的关键技术。虽然生物发光蛋白比荧光蛋白具有多种优势，但颜色变体的有限可用性使得同时观察多个目标变得困难。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/New-method-enables-simultaneous-multi-color-imaging-with-bioluminescent- Proteins.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/New-method-enables-simultaneous-multi-color-imaging-with-bioluminescent- Proteins.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd8a939e-c249-4707-b0a4-ed227624b8e0 Thu, 23 Jan 2025 06:30:52 -0500 New method enables simultaneous multi-color imaging with bioluminescent proteins
特朗普早期的健康举措表明他有意消除拜登的遗产。接下来的事情还不清楚。唐纳德·特朗普总统在医疗保健方面的早期行动表明，他可能打算取消拜登时代的一些计划，以降低药品成本并扩大公共保险计划的覆盖范围。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/Trumpe28099s-early-health-moves-signal-intent-to-erase-Bidene28099s-legacy-Whate28099s-next-is-unclear.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/Trumpe28099s-early-health-moves-signal-intent-to-erase-Bidene28099s-legacy-Whate28099s-next-is-unclear.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e740833-2c59-4506-b6d0-2f1669d76794 Thu, 23 Jan 2025 05:57:32 -0500 Trump’s early health moves signal intent to erase Biden’s legacy. What’s next is unclear.
由于各州在移民问题上存在分歧，医院表示不会拒绝患者加州建议医疗保健提供者不要在账单和医疗记录上写下患者的移民身份，并告诉他们不必协助联邦特工进行逮捕。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/As-states-diverge-on-immigration-hospitals-say-they-wone28099t-turn-病人-away.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/As-states-diverge-on-immigration-hospitals-say-they-wone28099t-turn-病人-away.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f1c2db8d-7aa5-436d-b905-16e4a2c88079 Thu, 23 Jan 2025 05:55:59 -0500 As states diverge on immigration, hospitals say they won’t turn patients away
预康复可以改善手术恢复并减少并发症《英国医学杂志》上发表的一项新研究表明，预康复（也称为 prehab）可能能够减少术后并发症和住院时间，同时还可以提高生活质量和身体恢复。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/Prehabilitation-may-improve-surgical-recovery-and-reduce-complications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/Prehabilitation-may-improve-surgical-recovery-and-reduce-complications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=68827fa9-fb69-4329-9400-a40ce55deb20 Thu, 23 Jan 2025 05:49:30 -0500 Prehabilitation may improve surgical recovery and reduce complications
达格列净和热量限制显示 2 型糖尿病缓解率更高《BMJ》今天发表的一项试验发现，患有超重或肥胖并患有 2 型糖尿病的成年人，在服用钠葡萄糖协同转运蛋白 2 (SGLT-2) 抑制剂药物达格列净和适度热量限制的情况下，与单独限制热量相比，其缓解率要高得多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/Dapagliflozin-and-calorie-restriction-show-higher-remission-rates-in-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/Dapagliflozin-and-calorie-restriction-show-higher-remission-rates-in-type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32e29b5e-7746-41ca-ae4a-4ec49f7ecbf3 Thu, 23 Jan 2025 05:44:22 -0500 Dapagliflozin and calorie restriction show higher remission rates in type 2 diabetes
奥拉帕尼治疗 HRD 阳性 BRCA 野生型卵巢癌的真实有效性和安全性卵巢癌是一种致命的妇科恶性肿瘤，随着聚（ADP-核糖）聚合酶（PARP）抑制剂的引入，其治疗模式发生了重大转变，该抑制剂现已成为一线化疗后维持治疗的标准配置。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/Real-world-effectness-and-safety-of-olaparib-in-HRD-positive-BRCA-wild-type-ovarian-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/Real-world-efficientness-and-safety-of-olaparib-in-HRD-positive-BRCA-wild-type-ovarian-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67ff345d-c64c-4091-b1ce-3d5ac1c31570 Thu, 23 Jan 2025 05:38:14 -0500 Real-world effectiveness and safety of olaparib in HRD-positive BRCA wild-type ovarian cancer
新的诊断设备可以在家中进行早期膀胱癌检测基于荧光的创新诊断系统利用未经处理的尿液样本进行家庭检测，以 90% 的准确率识别早期膀胱癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/New-diagnostic-device-could-enable-at-home-early-bladder-cancer-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/New-diagnostic-device-could-enable-at-home-early-bladder-cancer-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a92b468-5401-44f4-b8cd-bdbce2d39518 Thu, 23 Jan 2025 04:39:00 -0500 New diagnostic device could enable at-home early bladder cancer detection
FUJIFILM Irvine Scientific 将其医疗媒体业务出售给 Astorg富士胶片欧文科学公司 (FUJIFILM Irvine Scientific, Inc.) 是生命科学和医疗市场细胞培养解决方案创新和制造的全球领导者，今天宣布已达成协议，将其医疗媒体业务部门 (MBU) 出售给领先的泛医疗公司 Astorg。 -在全球医疗保健投资方面拥有广泛记录的欧洲私募股权公司。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/FUJIFILM-Irvine-Scientific-sells-its-medical-media-business-to-Astorg.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/FUJIFILM-Irvine-Scientific-sells-its-medical-media-business-to-Astorg.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3940b17f-eddb-43f7-a5a0-652be1bd4587 Thu, 23 Jan 2025 03:58:00 -0500 FUJIFILM Irvine Scientific sells its medical media business to Astorg
研究表明创伤后应激障碍（PTSD）和焦虑与女性消防员卵巢储备功能降低有关亚利桑那大学梅尔和伊妮德祖克曼公共卫生学院的研究人员与消防合作伙伴和全国其他研究人员通过消防员癌症队列研究合作领导的一项新研究表明，创伤后应激障碍和焦虑与较低水平有关女性消防员中抗苗勒氏管激素（卵巢储备的标志物）的含量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Study-links-PTSD-and-anxiety-to-lower-ovarian-reserve-in-women-firefighters.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Study-links-PTSD-and-anxiety-to-lower-ovarian-reserve-in-women-firefighters.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8597e920-a163-43f1-be1f-a7c23799cb1f Wed, 22 Jan 2025 21:55:47 -0500 Study links PTSD and anxiety to lower ovarian reserve in women firefighters
